## Validate.toConditionToken() function

Converts a string to a [ConditionToken](./ts-res.conditiontoken.md) if it is a valid condition token.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionToken(token: string): Result<ConditionToken>;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionToken](./ts-res.conditiontoken.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionToken](./ts-res.conditiontoken.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
